verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen,<s%> <S%H339>islands,<s%> to <S%H7181>me;<s%> and listen, you <S%H3816>peoples,<s%> from <S%H7350>far:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb;<s%> from the <S%H4578>bowels<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%> has he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of my <S%H8034>name:<s%>

and he has <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> like a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword;<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he has <S%H2244>hidden<s%> <S%H7760>me:<s%> and he has made me a <S%H1305>polished<s%> <S%H2671>shaft;<s%> in his <S%H827>quiver<s%> has he kept me <S%H5641>close:<s%>
and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5650>me,<s%> "You are my servant; <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in whom I will be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>"

But I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H3021>labored<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> for <S%H8414>nothing<s%> and <S%H1892>vanity;<s%> yet <S%H403>surely<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due to me is with <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and my <S%H6468>reward<s%> with my <S%H430>God.<s%>"

Now <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H3335>formed<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to be his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3478>him,<s%> and that Israel be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to <S%H3513>him<s%> (for I am honorable in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and my <S%H430>God<s%> has become my <S%H5797>strength<s%>);

<S%H559>yes,<s%> he says, "It is too light a <S%H7043>thing<s%> that you should be my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5341>preserved<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you for a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that you may be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his Holy <S%H6918>One,<s%> to him whom <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H960>despises,<s%> to him whom the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H8581>abhors,<s%> to a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers:<s%> <S%H4428>"Kings<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H6965>arise;<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and they shall <S%H7812>worship;<s%> because of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who is <S%H539>faithful,<s%> even the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who has chosen <S%H977>you.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "In an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> have I <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3117>you,<s%> and in a day of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> have I <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5341>you;<s%> and I will preserve <S%H5414>you,<s%> and give you for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H776>land,<s%> to make them <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5159>heritage:<s%>

<S%H559>saying<s%> to those who are <S%H631>bound,<s%> <S%H3318><s%> 'Come out!'; to those who are in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H1540><s%> 'Show <S%H7462>yourselves!<s%>' "They shall feed in the <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and on all bare <S%H8205>heights<s%> shall be their <S%H4830>pasture.<s%>

They shall not <S%H7456>hunger<s%> nor <S%H6770>thirst;<s%> neither shall the <S%H8273>heat<s%> nor <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H7355>them:<s%> for he who has mercy on them will <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H4002>them,<s%> even by springs of <S%H4325>water<s%> he will guide <S%H5095>them.<s%>
I will <S%H7760>make<s%> all my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H1870>way,<s%> and my <S%H4546>highways<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
<S%H935>Behold,<s%> these shall come from <S%H7350>far;<s%> and <S%H6828>behold,<s%> these from the north and from the <S%H3220>west;<s%> and these from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5515>Sinim.<s%>"

<S%H7442>Sing,<s%> <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and be <S%H1523>joyful,<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> and break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on his <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>
But <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> and the Lord has forgotten <S%H7911>me.<s%>"

"Can a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her nursing <S%H5764>child,<s%> that she should not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of her <S%H990>womb?<s%> <S%H7911>Yes,<s%> these may forget, yet I will not forget <S%H7911>you!<s%>
<S%H2710>Behold,<s%> I have engraved you on the palms of my <S%H3709>hands;<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> are continually before <S%H8548>me.<s%>
Your <S%H1121>children<s%> make <S%H4116>haste;<s%> your <S%H2040>destroyers<s%> and those who made you <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall go forth from <S%H3318>you.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and <S%H7200>see:<s%> all these gather themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2416>you.<s%> As I live," <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "you shall surely <S%H3847>clothe<s%> yourself with them all as with an <S%H5716>ornament,<s%> and <S%H7194>dress<s%> yourself with <S%H3618>them,<s%> like a bride.

<S%H2723>"For,<s%> as for your waste and your desolate <S%H8074>places,<s%> and your <S%H776>land<s%> that has been <S%H2035>destroyed,<s%> surely now you shall be too <S%H3334>small<s%> for the <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> and those who swallowed you <S%H1104>up<s%> shall be far <S%H7368>away.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H7923>bereavement<s%> shall yet <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> The <S%H4725>place<s%> is too <S%H6862>small<s%> for <S%H5066>me;<s%> give <S%H4725>place<s%> to me that I may <S%H3427>dwell.<s%>

Then you will <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3205><s%> 'Who has conceived these for <S%H7921>me,<s%> since I have been bereaved of my children, and am <S%H1565>solitary,<s%> an <S%H1540>exile,<s%> and wandering back and <S%H5493>forth?<s%> Who has brought <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H7604>these?<s%> Behold, I was left <S%H375>alone;<s%> these, where were they?'"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5375>"Behold,<s%> I will lift up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and set <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H5251>banner<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H2684>bosom,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> on their <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

<S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall be your nursing <S%H539>fathers,<s%> and their <S%H8282>queens<s%> your nursing <S%H3243>mothers:<s%> they shall bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to you with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me shall not be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>"
Shall the <S%H4455>prey<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> or the <S%H6662>lawful<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%> be <S%H4422>delivered?<s%>

But thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Even the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall be taken <S%H3947>away,<s%> and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered;<s%> for I will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with him who <S%H7378>contends<s%> with <S%H3467>you,<s%> and I will save your <S%H1121>children.<s%>

I will <S%H398>feed<s%> those who <S%H3238>oppress<s%> you with their own <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and they shall be <S%H7937>drunken<s%> with their own <S%H1818>blood,<s%> as with sweet <S%H6071>wine:<s%> and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, am your <S%H3467>Savior,<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the Mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>"
